General.Name: Stampede Capital Limited
General.Description: Stampede Capital Limited provides equity and currencies broking and trading services through various stock exchanges in India. The company offers portfolio management service, an investment portfolio of stocks, debt, cash, structured products, and other individual securities. It provides desktop and mobile platform for trading. The company was formerly known as Brilliant Securities Limited and changed its name to Stampede Capital Limited in July 2011. Stampede Capital Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

1.Name: Mr. Renduchintala Sri Naga Satya Venkata Jagannadha Prasad
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer
